title: Wholemeal oat buttermilk pancakes
ingredients: ['475ml buttermilk', '2 room-temperature eggs, lightly beaten', '80ml semi-skimmed milk', '120g quick cooking oats', '120g wholemeal flour', '2 teaspoons caster sugar', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1 teaspoon bicarbonate of soda', '1/2 teaspoon ground cinnamon, or to taste', '2 tablespoons butter, or as needed for cooking']
